title: EepURL - A Mailchimp Service
text_excerpt: EepURL - A Mailchimp Service Visit Mailchimp Â» EepURL We created EepURL as a trackable shortening service for Mailchimp's built-in Twitter integration . At the time, we opened it up to the public, because we felt there weren't enough monkey-based URL shorteners out there. This service is no longer available for public
